original_text: But I do not want to say any great things about myself. The only thing that makes me great is our Lord Jesus Christ's death on the cross. Because of Christ's sacrifice on the cross, it is like I have also died. The things that belong to this world have become dead to me, and I have become dead to them.
korean_text: 그러나 내게는 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 십자가 외에 결코 자랑할 것이 없으니 그리스도로 말미암아 세상이 나를 대하여 십자가에 못 박히고 내가 또한 세상을 대하여 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: But I do not want to say
The only thing that makes me great
is our Lord Jesus Christ's death on the cross
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 십자가 죽음입니다

sentences.original_text: Because of Christ's sacrifice on the cross
it is like I have also died
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 나 또한 죽은 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: The things that belong to this world
and I have become dead to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 그것들에게 죽은 사람이 되었습니다
